DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study evaluate efficacy safety HCP1301 capsule patient Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 3 Clinical Trial Evaluate Efficacy Safety HCP1303 Capsules
DOC.detailed_description: A multicenter , randomize , double-blind , phase 3 clinical trial evaluate efficacy safety HCP1303 capsule
DOC.criteria: At Visit 1 1 . ≥50 age 2 . BPH ( Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia ) + Total IPSS ( International Prostate Symptom Score ) ≥ 13 3 . Abnormal Erectile function ≥ least 3months base screening date At Visit 2 1 . Total IPSS ≥ 13 1 . History hypersensitivity Tamsulosin Tadalafil 2 . History allergy Sulfonamide 3 . PSA ( Prostate Specific Antigen ) ≥4ng/mL
